prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon with a starry theme and a serene expression, perfect for a magical forest.
Imagine a cute psychic-type creature that brings good luck and has a glowing aura.
Design a small, fairy-like Pokemon that has a whimsical appearance and can float gracefully.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of wishes and dreams, with a soft color palette.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a tiny star guardian, with large eyes and a gentle demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of fairy and psychic types, with a focus on harmony and peace.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like it came from a fairy tale, with a unique star-shaped design.
